short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean Title clears the tab title from those annoying notification numbers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you hate those annoying notification counters in the tab title of your browser Clean Title is the extension for you: it removes the counter and preserves the rest of the title so you can enjoy a notification-less experiece.

Currently supported sites:
- YouTube
- Gmail
- Twitch
- Twitter

-------------------------------

The code of this extension is fully open-source at https://github.com/DicyRoll/clean-title
